item.description:
We haven't had one in a while and we have had quite a few new members.
This is primarily a friendly/social get together, but we'll try to get some of the following addressed as well (don't hold me to it :-):

Agenda:
- Welcome new members
- Welcome Message
- Online Resources
- Meetup Alliance
- Discuss and encourage more game groups to form (what systems, genre, settings are of interest ..?)
- Encourage existing games to utilize Meetup for their scheduling/attendance (and raise awareness)
- Feedback from Story Games events
- Game Mastering Tips
- Recruiting for new Games
- Astra et Umbra -
- Tarot drawing (instead of a raffle) for a few Role-Playing books and a RPFGB hat
- Play a Game of Universalis (has become somewhat of a tradition)

Maybe:
- Game Designer Workshop with Vincent Baker
- Any other ideas or suggestions ... ?
item.name: Summer Fellowship Gathering
